parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Witness, evidence, testimony, reputation. From martus; evidence given.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
